source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_00<tab>Houu has had troubling news of late, and desires a shorewalker's help in calming the waters.
target: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_00<tab>ノォヴの育成地のホォウは、厄介な情報を掴んだようだ。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_01<tab>Warlike ways call for healing hands, and the Coral Tridents have added more sorcerers to their ranks. Houu asks you to remove at least three of them from their ranks, and thus put a damper on the Tridents' bellicose plans.
target: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_01<tab>ホォウから、「珊瑚の銛」が呼び寄せた、まじない師の討伐を頼まれた。サプサ産卵地の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209DE01 /var>」を3体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_02<tab>Leaving the practice of medicine is a painful experience, and you are glad that the healers are not alive to dwell on it. The peaceable Houu will no doubt share your relief when you return to Novv's Nursery and report all.
target: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209DE01 /var>を討伐した。ノォヴの育成地の「ホォウ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_03<tab>Houu seems glad to hear of the three sorcerers' departure, though it is never easy to tell with a Sahagin. Without healers to tend to their wounded, the Coral Tridents will surely be less likely to attack in the near future─another reprieve for Novv's people.
target: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_SEQ_03<tab>ホォウに、まじない師を討伐したことを報告した。癒し手を排除すれば、「珊瑚の銛」も下手に攻勢には出られないだろうと、ホォウは安堵したようだ。再びまじない師が呼び寄せられた際には、排除に協力しよう。
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_TODO_00<tab>サプサ産卵地の<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F209DE01 /var>を討伐

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_000<tab>Pshhh... My eyes and ears among the waves shhhay the Coral Tridents fetched shhhorcerers from the Indigo Deep.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_000フスィーッ……「珊瑚の銛」の連中が、
蒼茫洋の都から、まじない師を呼び寄せたらしい……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_001<tab>With shhhuch potent healers in their ranks, they will shhhurely launch an even greater onshhhlaught. This we cannot have...not me, not my shhhpawnbrothers, and certainly not the clutchfather.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_001奴ら、軍勢に癒し手を加えて、もっと暴れるつもりだ……。
それでは……フスィーッ……親父も困る……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_002<tab>Shhhorewalker, you must persuade these shhhorcerers to depart. Pshhh... I do not understand why they would not shhheek to shhhtay closer to home.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_002フスィーッ……サプサ産卵地に乗り込んで、まじない師……
「」を討ってくれ……。
都に帰りたいと思わせるほどにな……フスィーッ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_010<tab>Pshhh... Wade in the waters of the Shhhapsa Shhhpawning Grounds and turn back the Coral Tridents' new healers. They shhhould never have left the Indigo Deep...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_010フスィーッ……サプサ産卵地に乗り込んで、まじない師……
「」を討ってくれ……。
都に帰りたいと思わせるほどにな……フスィーッ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_020<tab>The waves brought news of your shhhuccess. We are in your debt. How you manage in the shhhea without any...anything is beyond me. Pshhh...
target:
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_020フスィーッ……。
まじない師たちを討ってくれたようだな……助かったぞ……。

source: TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_021<tab>Without the aid of shhhorcerers, the Coral Tridents dare not shhhtrike in force. The clutchfather will find the water shhhweeter for it.
target:
TEXT_BANSAH201_01390_HOUU_000_021フスィーッ……まじない師たちの支援がなければ、
「珊瑚の銛」も迂闊に攻勢に出れぬ……。
親父も迷惑しない……よきことだ……フスィーッ……。
